Errors.delimitersMustDiffer: The field and array delimiters must differ.
Errors.optionsRequired: Options were not passed and are required.

json2csv.dataNotArrayOfDocuments: Data provided was not an array of documents.
json2csv.notSameSchema: Not all documents have the same schema.
json2csv.propertyLeafExpected: The field used to contain a property leaf (object with nested properties) in previous documents. Types of fields must be the same.
json2csv.valueExpected: The field used to contain a value in previous document(s). Types of fields must be the same.

csv2json.noDataRetrieveHeading: No data provided to retrieve heading.
